attributes.action: provide a national subsidised and dedicated school bus service for every schoolchild from the age of five onwards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We call on this government to provide a nationwide dedicated school bus service,the benefits of which would be:
 1) to reduce the amount of vehicles on the roads during the morning rush hour by upto 20%.
 2)to reduce congestion and parking near to schools.
 3)prevent an estimated 40 deaths and 900 serious injuries attributed to the school run.
 4)reduce carbon emissions added whilst on school run 5)reduce truancy rates.
 5)safer journeys to school using same driver each route, safety belts and CCTV.
 6) reduce hours spent by parents driving to and from school.
 7)reduce vehicle and road wear and tear.
To use subsidies already paid out to school transport to allow fares to be kept well below cost of parents transporting children. 
We call on the Government to provide this service within the next 3 years
